variable.comment: The total distance run so far, in pixels.
variable.name: TotalDistance

variable.comment: Counts up to 'NextBlock', at which point a new block is created.
variable.name: CurrentDistance

variable.comment: The distance after which to create the next block.
variable.name: NextBlock

variable.comment: Use the name of the game to replace the xxx
variable.name: HighScoreKey

events.comment: Make sure everything moves left across the screen (since the default 0 degrees is right)
Keep incrementing the current and total distances, and display the total distance in a text object.
